bibl.title: Gleanings from Christian Northern Nubia.
bibl.note: Discusses some Greek and Coptic inscriptions. - 1. Aroumi from Taphis, αρα [Maria Grazia TIBILETTI BRUNO, Iscrizioni nubiane (Pavia, 1964) No. 49]. - 2. Manna from Kalabsha [I. Lefebvre 652 = S.B. III, 6089 = V, 8737 = M.G. TIBILETTI BRUNO, No. 47]. - 3. Paulos from Kalabsha (?), meizoteros (S.B. Kopt. I, 432). - 4. Building the town of Ikhmindi (S.B. VIII, 10074 = S.E.G. XVIII, 724; cf. XX, 702).
bibl.seg: VAN DER VLIET Jacques, Gleanings from Christian Northern Nubia.

Discusses some Greek and Coptic inscriptions. - 1. Aroumi from Taphis, αρα [Maria Grazia TIBILETTI BRUNO, Iscrizioni nubiane (Pavia, 1964) No. 49]. - 2. Manna from Kalabsha [I. Lefebvre 652 = S.B. III, 6089 = V, 8737 = M.G. TIBILETTI BRUNO, No. 47]. - 3. Paulos from Kalabsha (?), meizoteros (S.B. Kopt. I, 432). - 4. Building the town of Ikhmindi (S.B. VIII, 10074 = S.E.G. XVIII, 724; cf. XX, 702).
